product_name: The North Face Montana Gloves - Men's
long_description: An all-around alpine glove for skiing, mountaineering and other snowy adventures, the waterproof, insulated Montana gloves from The North Face protect your hands from the elements. HyVent waterproof, breathable inserts keep moisture from getting inside. Heatseeker(TM) polyester fiber insulation at the palms and backs of hands keeps you toasty warm on cold days. Removable wrist wraps inside the gloves are designed to hold hand warmer packets (sold separately) to warm blood as it flows to your hands. 5 Dimensional Fit(TM) uses 5 measurements of the hand to construct gloves with an accurate and consistent fit. Radiametric Articulation(TM) improves warmth and blood flow to your fingers by mirroring the natural relaxed curve of the hand. Grippy polyurethane palms help you hold onto ski poles and other gear. Cinch the gaskets at the cuffs on The North Face Montana gloves to lock out winter weather.
